text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/payment-kind defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
deposit Deposit on AccountThe payment or adjustment is to an indicated account not to a specific charge.
periodic-payment Periodic PaymentThe payment is one of a set of previously agreed payments, for example in fullfilment of a payment plan.
online Online Bill PaymentPayment, full or partial, of an invoice or statement provided to the payment issuer.
kiosk Kiosk PaymentPayment made at an authorized Kiosk.

name: PaymentKindCodes
title: Payment Kind Codes
description: This value set contains codes for the type of workflow from which payments arise.

concept.definition: The payment or adjustment is to an indicated account not to a specific charge.
The payment is one of a set of previously agreed payments, for example in fullfilment of a payment plan.
Payment, full or partial, of an invoice or statement provided to the payment issuer.
Payment made at an authorized Kiosk.
